explains: adj. 有争议的，造成分裂的

sentences.en: Are there divisive issues and pockets of seething anger in America?
sentences.cn: 美国是否存在分裂社会的问题和极度愤怒的群体？

sentences.en: Abortion has always been a divisive issue.
sentences.cn: 堕胎一直是个有争议的问题。

sentences.en: He believes that unemployment is socially divisive.
sentences.cn: 他认为失业会引起社会不稳定。
